PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
MedicalHistory: History of chronic low back pain
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock.
Underwent percutaneous coronary intervention with stent placement on 09/21/2024.
Impella device inserted on 09/21/2024, removed on 09/27/2024.
Re-intubated on 09/28/2024 due to poor secretion management.
Family discussions regarding goals of care due to guarded prognosis.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 with ongoing critical care needs.

InfectionIndicators.BloodCulture: No organism isolated on current cultures, MRSA PCR negative.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Fever and leukocytosis noted with ongoing monitoring for sepsis without a known source.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Blood transfusion administered to maintain hemoglobin above 8.
